verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <WH8067> upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> of David הוֹשִׁ֣יעָה <WH3467> Help יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> for גָמַ֣ר <WH1584> ceaseth חָסִ֑יד <WH2623> for the godly man כִּי־ <WH3588> for פַ֥סּוּ <WH6461> fail אֱ֝מוּנִ֗ים <WH539> for the faithful מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <WH7723> vanity יְֽדַבְּרוּ֮ <WH1696> They speak אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> every one אֶת־ <WH854> for רֵ֫עֵ֥הוּ <WH7453> with his neighbour שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> lips חֲלָק֑וֹת <WH2513> [with] flattering בְּלֵ֖ב <WH3820> [and] with a double וָלֵ֣ב <WH3820> heart יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> do they speak

יַכְרֵ֣ת <WH3772> shall cut off יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all שִׂפְתֵ֣י <WH8193> lips חֲלָק֑וֹת <WH2513> all flattering לָ֝שׁ֗וֹן <WH3956> [and] the tongue מְדַבֶּ֥רֶת <WH1696> that speaketh גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <WH1419> proud

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> Who אָֽמְר֨וּ ׀ <WH559> Who have said לִלְשֹׁנֵ֣נוּ <WH3956> With our tongue נַ֭גְבִּיר <WH1396> will we prevail שְׂפָתֵ֣ינוּ <WH8193> our lips אִתָּ֑נוּ <WH853> מִ֖י <WH4310> who אָד֣וֹן <WH113> [are] our own who [is] lord לָֽנוּ׃

מִשֹּׁ֥ד <WH7701> For the oppression עֲנִיִּים֮ <WH6041> of the poor מֵאַנְקַ֪ת <WH603> for the sighing אֶבְי֫וֹנִ֥ים <WH34> of the needy עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now אָ֭קוּם <WH6965> now will I arise יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD אָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> I will set בְּ֝יֵ֗שַׁע <WH3468> [him] in safety יָפִ֥יחַֽ <WH6315> [from him that] puffeth לֽוֹ׃

אִֽמֲר֣וֹת <WH565> The words יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD אֲמָר֪וֹת <WH565> words טְהֹ֫ר֥וֹת <WH2889> [are] pure כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> [as] silver צָ֭רוּף <WH6884> tried בַּעֲלִ֣יל <WH5948> in a furnace לָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of earth מְ֝זֻקָּ֗ק <WH2212> purified שִׁבְעָתָֽיִם׃ <WH7659> seven times

אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> O יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> them O LORD תִּשְׁמְרֵ֑ם <WH8104> Thou shalt keep תִּצְּרֶ֓נּוּ ׀ <WH5341> thou shalt preserve מִן־ <WH4480> at הַדּ֖וֹר <WH1755> generation ז֣וּ <WH2098> them from this לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for ever

סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> on every side רְשָׁעִ֥ים <WH7563> The wicked יִתְהַלָּכ֑וּן <WH1980> walk כְּרֻ֥ם <WH7311> are exalted זֻ֝לּ֗וּת <WH2149> when the vilest לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men
